Package labBClimateMonitoringClient

package labBClimateMonitoringClient
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AreaCreationWindow
    Class that opens a new UI window for creating InterestedArea objects to add to the DB
    AreaViewWindow
    Class that opens a new UI window for viewing all the climate parameters associated with a certain area
    ClientMain
    Class containing the main method
    ClimateParameters
    Serializable class modelling an entry in the DB submitted by a registered user.
    ConnectionManager
    Class implementing the Singleton design pattern that handles all client-server communication.
    ErrorWindow
    Class that opens a new UI window to show errors found during execution
    InterestedArea
    Serializable class that models a geographical area of interest
    LoginWindow
    Class that opens a new UI window to let the user log in
    MonitoringCentre
    Serializable lass that models a monitoring centre
    MonitoringCentreCreationWindow
    Class that opens a new UI window to let registered users create a new MonitoringCentre
    ParameterAddingWindow
    Class that opens a new UI window for adding ClimateParameters to the server DB
    Registered
    Serializable class that models a registered user
    RegisteredMenuWindow
    Class that opens a new UI window for registered users.
    RegistrationWindow
    Class that opens a new UI window for registering users.
    UnregisteredMenuWindow
    Class that opens a new UI main menu window for unregistered users.
